criteria: Effectiveness of communication in conveying the health issue or emergency.
Appropriateness of the method used to seek help.
Clarity and accuracy of information provided when seeking help.
descriptions: Fails to communicate the health issue or emergency.
Communication is unclear and does not effectively convey the health issue or emergency; key details are missing.
Communication is somewhat clear but lacks important details; the health issue or emergency is partially conveyed.
Communication is clear and conveys the health issue or emergency with sufficient detail.
Communication is very clear, detailed, and effectively conveys the health issue or emergency, demonstrating good articulation.

Communication is exceptionally clear, detailed, and effectively conveys the health issue or emergency with excellent articulation and precision; demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of communication techniques.
Uses a completely inappropriate method to seek help.
The method used to seek help is inappropriate for the situation and may cause further harm or delay.
The method used to seek help is partially appropriate but may not be the most effective choice.
The method used to seek help is appropriate for the situation and likely to yield positive results.
The method used to seek help is highly appropriate and demonstrates a thoughtful understanding of available resources.
The method used to seek help is exceptionally appropriate, demonstrating a deep understanding of available resources and strategic decision-making in seeking assistance.
Provides no information or completely inaccurate information.
Provides unclear and/or inaccurate information, hindering the ability to receive appropriate help.
Provides some information, but key details are missing or inaccurate, limiting the effectiveness of the help-seeking process.
Provides clear and accurate information necessary for receiving appropriate help.
Provides very clear and accurate information, including relevant details that facilitate the help-seeking process.
Provides exceptionally clear, accurate, and comprehensive information, anticipating potential questions and facilitating an efficient and effective help-seeking process.
